item.title: Lisa add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Soren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Love is the expression of the one who loves, not of the one who is loved. Those who think they can love only the people they prefer do not love at all. Love discovers truths about individuals that others cannot see" -- Soren Kierkegaard

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "I am lonely, yet not everybody will do. I don't know why, some people fill the gaps and others emphasize my loneliness. In reality those who satisfy me are those who simply allow me to live with my ''idea of them." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Anxiety is love's greatest killer. It makes others feel as you might when a drowning man holds on to you. You want to save him, but you know he will strangle you with his panic." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "What can I do with my happiness? How can I keep it, conceal it, bury it where I may never lose it? I want to kneel as it falls over me like rain, gather it up with lace and silk, and press it over myself again." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Wherever you go, go with all your heart." -- Confucius
